mapper.select: SELECT returnNum, reqDate, reason, quantity, status, returnDate, r.orderDetailNum, od.salePrice FROM Return r LEFT OUTER JOIN orderDetail od ON r.orderDetailNum = od.orderDetailNum WHERE ROWNUM <= 5 and status <= 1 ORDER BY reqDate ASC
SELECT refundNum, refundAmount, refundDate, refundMethod, status, orderDetailNum FROM refund WHERE ROWNUM <= 5 and status <= 1 ORDER BY refundDate ASC
